question: Which CYP gene polymorphism is a well-known predictor of efavirenz disposition?
ideal_answer: Cytochrome P450 (CYP) CYP2B6 G516T (rs3745274) is a well-known predictor of efavirenz disposition.

snippets.text: Cytochrome P450 (CYP) CYP2B6 G516T (rs3745274) is a well-known predictor of efavirenz disposition.
